jammanZ.name: Stab
jammanZ.description: Stab for <y>90% damage</c> hitting <y>up to 5</c> enemies.

jammanX.name: Raspberry Bullet
jammanX.description:
Fire a projectile from your rod for <y>60% damage.</c>
<y>Pierces enemies</c> and causes bleeding for <y>4x60% damage</c> over time.

jammanX2.name: Spoiled Bullet
jammanX2.description:
Fire a projectile from your rod for <y>80% damage.</c>
<y>Pierces enemies</c> and <b>poison</c> them.

jammanC.name: Roll
jammanC.description:
<y>Roll forward</c> a small distance.
You <b>cannot be hit</c> while rolling.

jammanV.name: Spikes of Death
jammanV.description: Form spikes in front of yourself dealing up to <y>3x240% damage</c>.

jammanVBoosted.name: Spikes of Super Death
jammanVBoosted.description: Form spikes in both directions dealing up to <y>2x3x240% damage</c>.

jamman.endQuote: ..and so it left, still not knowing how it got here to begin with.
jamman.description:
The <y>Jam Man</c> is an <y>example character</c> intended to serve as a base for other characters.
<y>Stab</c> can hit more enemies at a time compared to other melee attacks.
<y>Raspberry Bullet</c> can be used as an opener to deal extra damage as you use other skills.
<y>Spikes of Death</c> is very effective against large groups.
jamman.name: Jam Man
jamman.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<y>[Merchandise Class] 

<ul>This pot of jam seems expired.
